pr_title: #280 Copy other assets from the iOS folder

timeline.message: #280 Copy other assets from the iOS folder

timeline.bodyText: add some doc: this is copying $project/src/main/resources/assets/foo to $project/build bar?
timeline.author: johanvos

timeline.bodyText:
from this, it is not clear to me if that assets folder is something the user has to supply, or that it is auto-generated.
If the user has to supply it, it should start with src
if it is generated, it should start with gensrc
timeline.author: johanvos
